contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=February 2008}} '''Viking Hockey''' is an [[ice hockey]] team based in [[Stavanger]], [[Norway]]. The club was founded in 1998, replacing [[Viking IK]], which had folded in 1996. They played one season in the [[GET-ligaen]], 1998-99. The team colors are blue and they play home matches in [[Siddishallen]]. ==Famous players== *[[Rob Schistad]] *[[Eirik Cecil Paulsen]] *[[Kyle McDonough]] *[[Tore Vikingstad]] *[[Ed Galliani]] ==See also== *[[Stavanger Oilers]] ==External links== *{{official website|http://www.viking-hockey.no/}} {{Norwegian First Division (ice hockey)}} [[Category:Ice hockey teams in Norway]] [[Category:Sport in Stavanger]] [[Category:1998 establishments in Norway]] {{Norway-sport-team-stub}} {{Europe-icehockey-team-stub}}
